data.short_description: Headphones and earphones, whether or not combined with a microphone
data.long_description: Headphones and earphones, whether or not combined with a microphone, and sets consisting of a microphone and one or more loudspeakers.

tariffs.additional_duties: Check Section 301 tariffs if origin is China.

embedding_content: HS Code 8518.30 covering Headphones and earphones, Bluetooth headsets. Import duty for Germany (EU) is 0%. US base rate is 0% but may be subject to Section 301 China trade war tariffs.

data.short_description: Machines for the reception, conversion and transmission or regeneration of voice, images or other data
data.long_description: Includes Smartwatches, Bluetooth adapters, and IoT gateways. Excluding simple headphones.

tariffs.notes: Standard VAT 19% applies on import value.

embedding_content: HS Code 8517.62 covering Smartwatches, IoT devices, and data transmission equipment. Distinct from headphones. Often contains Lithium Ion batteries requiring UN3481 compliance. Duty free in EU.

data.short_description: Parts of telephone sets and other apparatus for transmission of data
data.long_description: Includes Smartwatch components and specialized sub-assemblies. Shared static data across diverted routes.

embedding_content: HS Code 8517.79 covering Smartwatch components and parts. Static data remains valid during route changes. Duty free in Netherlands.

data.long_description: Lithium-ion batteries used in smartwatches and consumer electronics.
data.hazardous_note: UN 3481 / UN 38.3 Testing Required. Class 9 Dangerous Goods.

embedding_content: HS Code 8507.60 covering Lithium-ion batteries (UN 3481). Categorized as Class 9 Hazardous. UN 38.3 test report required for both direct and diverted routes via Cape.
